title: STAT+: Pharmalittle: We’re reading about China’s homegrown GLP-1 drugs, a puzzling FDA rejection, and more
description: The FDA rejected a Disc Medicine therapy for a rare blood disorder, the first experimental drug to go through a new program to fast-track drug reviews
content: The FDA rejected a Disc Medicine therapy for a rare blood disorder, the first experimental drug to go through a new program to fast-track drug reviews
